channel.title: Relics on Spicy Chicken Quest
channel.description: Recent content in Relics on Spicy Chicken Quest

item.title: Lvl80
item.description: Level 80 Progress To be effient, have 5 quests running at once to ensure that you get everything all the time from all the things. For Want of a Memory (BSF, HW Fates) The Will to Resist (Antitower) Change of Arms (CT, CLL, CE BSF) A New Path of Resistance (DR) Irresistible (DR, Dalraida, LVL 70 Dungeon, HoH ) Done: Steps Resistance First Free. Each additional one takes 4 Thavnairian Scalepowders (Cost 1000 Poetics)

item.title: Lvl70
item.description: Fabulous Website: https://ffxiv-eureka.com/ Weapon Specific Relic Every Instance of Eureka has it’s own relic step. In each Individual Instance, there will be a map boss which drops the needed item for the relic. You don’t have to farm the map boss for their item! The item from Aenmos, Pagos and Pyros can be bought at The Expedition Birdwatcher found in each zone. Eureka Anemos Item Required Amount Which step?

item.title: Lvl60
item.description: Fabulous Guide: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bsHZM-0sSdaajAwILUPbUSOsMzDiCP7o4DGb3-gQTog/edit#gid=0 Level 60 Progress Get these things FFXIV Teamcraft List https://ffxivteamcraft.com/list/0U7xOW23TWCq83EFCALd Item Number How many I have Cost Unidentifiable Bone 10 48 150 Poetics Unidentifiable Shell 10 26 150 Poetics Unidentifiable Ore 10 28 150 Poetics Unidentifiable Seeds 10 21 150 Poetics Adamantite Francesca 4 0 10K Grand Company Seals Titanium Alloy Mirror 4 0 10K Grand Company Seals Dispelling Arrow 4 0 10K Grand Company Seals Kingcake 4 0 10K Grand Company Seals Aether Oil 5 5 350 Poetics Umbrites 60-80 368 75 Poetics Crystal Sands 60-80 82 Singing Clusters 50 410 40 Poetics / Quests Pneumites 15 107 100 Poetics Archaic Enchanted Ink 1 6 500 Poetics
